mapper.insert: insert into page (pageId, pageName, status, createTime, type, beginTime, endTime, platform, editor, createBy, projectId) values (#{pageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{platform,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update page set pageName = #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beginTime = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=CHAR}, editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createBy = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, projectId = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pageId = #{pageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pageId, pageName, status, createTime, type, beginTime, endTime, platform, editor, createBy, projectId from page where pageId = #{pageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select pageId, pageName, status, createTime, type, beginTime, endTime, platform, editor, createBy, projectId from page
